qas.question: What supernatural things have been portrayed in matches?

answers.text: magic, curses, the undead and Satanic imagery

qas.question: What can be used in a wrestling story?

answers.text: anything that can be used as an element of drama

qas.question: What romantic drama might be used in a story?

context: Also, <a1_0>anything that can be used as an element of drama<a1_0/> can exist in professional wrestling stories: romantic relationships (including <a2_0>love triangles and marriage<a2_0/>), racism, classism, nepotism, favoritism, corporate corruption, family bonds, personal histories, grudges, theft, cheating, assault, betrayal, bribery, seduction, stalking, confidence tricks, extortion, blackmail, substance abuse, self-doubt, self-sacrifice; even kidnapping, sexual fetishism, necrophilia, misogyny, rape and death have been portrayed in wrestling. Some promotions have included supernatural elements such as <a0_0>magic, curses, the undead and Satanic imagery<a0_0/> (most notably The Undertaker and his Ministry of Darkness, a stable that regularly performed evil rituals and human sacrifice in Satanic-like worship of a hidden power figure). Celebrities would also be involved in storylines.
